summary: This document is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York discussing the drafting and review of a legal brief concerning a Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA). The emails show collaborative editing and scheduling for review of the document.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the initial email attaching the draft NPA brief and requesting review from colleagues.

events.title: NPA Brief Drafting and Review
events.description: Email correspondence regarding the review and editing of a draft legal brief concerning a Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA).
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated February 23, 2021, discussing a draft legal brief related to a Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA).
The correspondence is between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York.
The draft brief is described as having strong arguments in the first half but concerns about the second half.
The emails indicate collaborative editing and scheduling for review of the legal document.
